connection_string.description: MongoDB connection string in the format: mongodb://[username:password@]host[:port]/[database][?options]. Example: mongodb://user:pass@localhost:27017/mydb or mongodb+srv://cluster.mongodb.net
connection_string.title: Connection String

database.description: Name of the database to write to.
database.title: Database

auth_source.description: Database where user credentials are stored. Defaults to 'admin'.
auth_source.title: Authentication Source

batch_size.description: Number of documents to insert in a single batch. Higher values improve performance but use more memory. Default: 10,000
batch_size.title: Batch Size
